title: Got the 280 order package but didn't get border?
body:
I saved up enough tokens for the 280 order token package, including buying the way of the order thing, but I didn't get the border... anyway to get back my tokens for 2 orb of orders?

EDIT: just read the FAQ for the event, yeah i really want to refund this token purchase, I don't even own riven

replies.body:
Yeeeaaaa those borders are definitely only for the champions they were made for. Exactly like Conqueror Karma we previously released, she had a special border that would only work for that skin. 

I'm not sure how refunds will be handled considering you still got the icon, and it was made aware that the border only works for those skins on the [**VS Event Site.**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017)

> Q: I redeemed my tokens for a loading screen border. Do I have to do anything else for it to show up?
> A: Nope, once you redeem it, the loading screen border will automatically appear forever for Dawnbringer Riven or Nightbringer Yasuo. This doesnâ€™t replace season rank borders.

You're still more than welcome to shoot our billing team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what might be able to be done.
Is there any way we can refund the icon (having used the 3 refunds available)...?
